attributes.action: Walsall FC Chairman Jeff Bonser must provide additional funds to secure the striker that will ignite our League One promotion push.
attributes.additional_details: Walsall supporters call on Her Majesty's government to lobby the Walsall FC chairman Jeffrey W Bonser to provide manager Dean Smith with additional funds to sign a top-notch target man and goalscorer to help us win more games. This would generate both economic benefits and a 'feel good factor' for the entire West Midlands and possibly the country as a whole. Furthermore, a new striker would almost certainly halt the EuroZone crisis as well as defusing tension between North and South Korea.
